CSSWhite-space-collapse.summary: The white-space-collapse CSS property controls how whitespace inside an element is collapsed.

blockquote.para: Note: The white-space-collapse and text-wrap properties can be declared together using the white-space shorthand property.

remarks.para:
-Shorthand for white-space-collapse and text-wrap: The white-space property.
-CSS text module

value.blockquote: NOTENote: Segment break characters are characters such as line feeds that cause text to break onto new lines.
